releaseNotes:
<Grid Background="#007FFF">
        <Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>
        </Grid.RowDefinitions>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="0" Text="Username:" Margin="10"/>
        <TextBox Grid.Row="1" x:Name="txtUsername" Margin="10"/>

        <TextBlock Grid.Row="2" Text="Password:" Margin="10"/>
        <PasswordBox Grid.Row="3" x:Name="txtPassword" Margin="10"/>

        <Button Grid.Row="4" Content="Login" Click="btnLogin_Click" Margin="10"/>
    </Grid>
